programme.title: Central Intelligence
programme.desc: A mild-mannered accountant runs into an old high-school classmate, an overweight loser-turned-muscular CIA agent, and ends up helping him with a crucial mission involving the hacking of U.S. spy satellites. (cc)

programme.title: Duplicity
programme.desc: Two rival corporate spies and former government employees begin a clandestine love affair as they try to outwit and double-cross each other. (cc)

programme.title: Held Up
programme.desc: An affable businessman (Jamie Foxx) gets stuck in the middle of a wacky hostage crisis inside a small-town convenience store. Rae: Nia Long. Pembry: Barry Corbin. Jack: John Cullum. Beaumont: Jake Busey. Rodrigo: Eduardo Yanez. Gloria: Julie Hagerty. (cc)

programme.title: From Hell
programme.desc: Johnny Depp plays an opium-addicted inspector who uses his clairvoyant powers to try to track down Jack the Ripper in 19th-century London. Heather Graham, Ian Holm, Ian Richardson, Robbie Coltrane, Lesley Sharp. Directed by Albert and Allen Hughes. (cc)

programme.title: Reign Of Fire
programme.desc: In a post-apocalyptic future, the world has been besieged by intelligent, fire-breathing dragons. A survivalist and a military man clash as they lead one of the last few vestiges of humanity in an all-out war against the vicious prehistoric beasts. (cc)

programme.title: Jersey Boys
programme.desc: This musical drama chronicles the rise and fall of Frankie Valli and the Four Seasons, one of the key pop groups of the early '60s, responsible for such iconic hits as "Sherry," "Walk Like a Man" and "Big Girls Don't Cry." (cc)

programme.title: Practical Magic
programme.desc: Two witches become the target of a detective's investigation after one of their boyfriends goes missing. (cc)

programme.title: Laurel Canyon
programme.desc: A hard-partying rock-and-roll record producer opens her posh California digs to her stuffy son and his equally stuffy fiancée. The character study was written and directed by Lisa Cholodenko, who was partially inspired to make the film while listening to Joni Mitchell's landmark "Ladies of the Canyon" album. Actor Alessandro Nivola, who plays Ian, lead singer of an English rock band, does his own vocals. (cc)

programme.title: Risky Business
programme.desc: A teenager with a bright future turns his house into a brothel while his parents are away, falls for a prostitute and earns the wrath of Guido the Killer Pimp in this comedy highlighted by Tom Cruise's star-making performance. (cc)

programme.title: Taxi
programme.desc: After losing his driver's license, a bumbling cop teams up with a brassy cabbie so he can pursue a team of female bank robbers who are led by a beautiful Brazilian. (cc)

programme.title: Be Cool
programme.desc: Mobster Chili Palmer ditches the movie biz for the music industry when he decides to manage a singer in this sequel. (cc)(n)

programme.title: American Psycho
programme.desc: A rich Wall Street player (Christian Bale) basks in his late-1980s yuppie lifestyle, but behind his slick appearance lurks a murderous monster. Jared Leto, Willem Dafoe, Samantha Mathis, Chloe Sevigny, Reese Witherspoon, Josh Lucas. Contains extra footage not shown in theaters. Mary Harron directed the adaptation of Bret Easton Ellis's controversial novel. (cc)(n)

programme.title: A Sound of Thunder
programme.desc: A time-travel expedition to hunt dinosaurs results in a disastrous alteration of history. Shoddy adaptation of Ray Bradbury's classic short story. Edward Burns, Catherine McCormack, Ben Kingsley, Jemima Rooper. Directed by Peter Hyams. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Morgan
programme.desc: A corporate consultant must determine the fate of a mysterious artificial being called Morgan, which has begun evolving at a faster rate than anticipated. When Morgan attacks one of her creators, the group surrounding her are pressed to make a decision. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Last Boy Scout
programme.desc: An ex-quarterback teams up with a down-on-his-luck PI whose quarry is murdered while he was supposed to be protecting her. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Step Up
programme.desc: In this teen tale full of dancing and romancing, a Baltimore tough guy teams with a haughty ballerina for a dance competition at her prestigious private school. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Sgt. Bilko
programme.desc: A conniving army sergeant pulls numerous cons while feuding with one of his former victims who attempts to get him kicked out of the service. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Glory Road
programme.desc: This sports-history saga is the fact-based tale of the Texas Western squad that won the 1966 NCAA basketball championship—the first team to do so starting an all-black lineup. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Urban Cowboy
programme.desc: Popular country-western take on "Saturday Night Fever" about a good ol' boy looking for love from atop a mechanical bull in a Houston honky-tonk. Based on a magazine article by Aaron Latham, who co-wrote the script. (cc)(n)

programme.title: In a Valley of Violence
programme.desc: Mysterious loner Paul, headed to Mexico with his collie at his side, stumbles into a small-town saloon. There, he brawls with a rowdy gang and finds himself exiled by the town marshal, which sparks a bloody quest for revenge in this Western thriller. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia!
programme.desc: A bride-to-be in Greece attempts to solve the mystery of her paternity by reading her mother's diary. Based on the popular ABBA-inspired stage musical. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
programme.desc: A study of adolescent obsession with sex, drugs, and rock and roll has a girl seeking romance advice from an upperclassman on how to get a boy to notice her; and a stoner feuding with a teacher. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Good Will Hunting
programme.desc: An Oscar-winning screenplay by costars Matt Damon and Ben Affleck propels this tale about a brilliant but undisciplined janitor who confronts his problems with the help of a therapist (Robin Williams, who also won an Oscar). (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Verdict
programme.desc: An alcoholic lawyer thinks he can make some quick cash getting a settlement for the family of a woman who is in a coma after being operated on at a Catholic hospital. However, he becomes emotionally involved in the case, turns down the offer, and takes the powerful institution to court. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Just Wright
programme.desc: A tough-talking physical therapist named Leslie Wright (Queen Latifah) is hired to rehab an injured NBA star, whose fiancée leaves him when it looks like his career is over. Eventually, Leslie finds herself falling for the athlete and she discovers the feeling may be mutual. But after his rehab is complete, his fiancée returns to reclaim her man. Directed by Sanaa Hamri. (repeat)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: A kind of `Cosby' or `Father Knows Best' for the times, about a trucking-company executive, his wife and their three kids in suburban Connecticut. A steady performer for ABC, `Wife' ranges from issue-oriented to slapstick. It's very much the vision of star Damon Wayans (also a coexecutive producer), who based it in part on his own life, and frequently uses family members as actors, directors and screenwriters. (repeat) (cc)

programme.desc: T.I. and Young Dro compete in "Got Props," "Plead the Fifth," "Remix" and the "Wildstyle" battle. (repeat)(c)

programme.title: Nick Cannon Presents: Wild 'N Out
programme.desc: Clipse and Pharrell perform “Mr. Me Too”; Fat Joe is a team captain. (repeat)(c)

programme.title: Nick Cannon Presents: Wild 'N Out
programme.sub-title: K. Michelle; Antonio Cromartie; Flo Rida
programme.desc: Nick Cannon, K. Michelle, Antonio Cromartie and Flo Rida battle it out in the games "Talking Spit," "Hood Jeopardy," "R&Beef" and the "Wildstyle" battle. (repeat)(c)

programme.title: Nick Cannon Presents: Wild 'N Out
programme.desc: Nick Cannon and Trina battle it out in "Talking Spit," "Turn Me Up in the Headphones," "Remix" and the "Wildstyle" battle. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Nick Cannon Presents: Wild 'N Out
programme.sub-title: Remy Ma & Papoose; Hitman Holla & Conceited
programme.desc: Remy Ma and Papoose compete in "Flow Job," "Rest in Peace," "Broadway Remix" and the "Wildstyle" battle. Also: Hitman Holla and Conceited perform. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Yandy gets revenge on her interfering mother-in-law; Jaquae makes a discovery about Sophia; MariahLynn confronts James R.; Jonathan and Anais try to fix their friendship; Lil Mo wants Karl to squash the internet rumors. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: When confronted by rumors about Yandy, Bianca goes on the attack. Safaree suffers a huge loss. Mariah and Self discuss Dreamdoll. Rich and Anais have a rendezvous. Karl takes a lie-detector test for Lil Mo. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Love & Hip Hop
programme.desc: Remy Ma invites Lil Mo to her store opening, but an uninvited guest pops up. Yandy and Bianca put their professional relationship on the line. Rich debates telling Navarro about his relationship with Anais. James R surprises Sophia with a gift. Jaquae gets angry. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Lottery Ticket
programme.desc: A young man (Bow Wow) in the projects has a lottery ticket worth $370 million, but he must stay hidden from moochers and local thugs for a few days until he can get to the lottery office and collect his winnings. While lying low, he relies on help from his best friend and a mysterious retired boxer. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Honeymooners
programme.desc: New York City bus driver Ralph Kramden (Cedric the Entertainer) and sewer worker Ed Norton (Mike Epps) engineer a number of get-rich-quick schemes. Feeble attempt to capture the magic of the 1950s TV series. Gabrielle Union and Regina Hall costar as the boys' long-suffering wives. Directed by John Schultz(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: Accusations of blame are directed at Will when Joaquin's ex-baseball coach dies on his operating table. Meanwhile, gym teacher Reggie (Maurice G. Jones) sets out to woo Cora, but Brown doesn't feel Reggie makes the grade. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: The issue of Eddie's death begins to drive Will and Sasha apart. Meanwhile, Cora utilizes reverse-psychology methods on Brown to nudge him toward liking Reggie (Maurice G. Jones). (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: A suspended Will becomes an idle slacker, sleeping the days away and neglecting the children. Meanwhile, Brown learns a valuable lesson about being well-versed in other languages. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: Daisy's memory issues trigger the arrival of her cousin (Rue McClanahan), but buried family secrets are then revealed. Elsewhere, Reggie's outdated attitude toward women irks Cora. Kim Fields directed the episode. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Tyler Perry's Meet the Browns
programme.desc: Will's mother (Jenifer Lewis) arrives to spread cheer to her son---but she shows up with his former fiancée. Meanwhile, Brianna is cast in the role of a parent as part of a school assignment. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: While clothes shopping with Fancy and her parents (Marilyn McCoo and Billy Davis Jr.), Jamie's credit card is denied, leading Fancy's father to question whether Jamie has the means to care for his daughter properly. Meanwhile, Braxton makes cuts in the hotel's budget. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. Braxton: Christopher B. Duncan. Junior: Garrett Morris. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: Fancy spies Jamie leaving a nightclub with an attractive, young female client whom he was ordered to take out on the town. When Fancy asks about the outing, Jamie describes the client as an old woman. Meanwhile, Braxton steals Fancy's idea for sprucing up the rooms at the hotel. Camille: Salli Richardson. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. Bob: Blake Clark. Sheila: Sherri Shepherd. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: Jamie takes the guys to the beach in Fancy's new BMW, which gets towed while they're playing volleyball with some bikini-clad beauties. Meanwhile, Braxton faces a potential strike by the hotel's employees. Donyel: Traci Bingham. Larry: Perry Anzilotti. Gloria: Karen Maruyama. Sheila: Sherrie Shepherd. Phil: Alex Thomas. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Jamie Foxx Show
programme.desc: Fancy needs a new kitchen countertop installed in time for Nikki's bridal shower, which Fancy reluctantly agrees to host. Meanwhile, Braxton dreads attending an awards banquet in his honor because he can't find a date. Albert: Paul Wilson. Jimmy: James A. Watson Jr. Gloria: Karen Maruyama. Fancy: Garcelle Beauvais. Braxton: Christopher B. Duncan. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.sub-title: Not with My Cousin, You Don't
programme.desc: Will and Carlton "roam the intercom" system at home and overhear Ashley's private conversation---about sex. Jaleel White guests. Ashley: Tatyana M. Ali. Will: Will Smith. Carlton: Alfonso Ribeiro. Keesha: Yunoka Doyle. Janet: Nicole Bilderback. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Carlton is on a roll at the gaming tables in Vegas with Will in tow---but the tables turn. Casino Manager: Wayne Newton. Carlton: Alfonso Ribeiro. Hilary: Karyn Parsons. Vivian: Daphne Maxwell Reid. Ashley: Tatyana M. Ali. Will: Will Smith. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Hilary and Carlton volunteer at a homeless shelter on Thanksgiving, while the extended family fills up on holiday treats. Part 1 of two. Hattie: Virginia Capers. Vy: Vernee Watson-Johnson. Helen: Jenifer Lewis. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air
programme.desc: Conclusion. Will and Philip are arrested at a massage parlor on Thanksgiving; Hilary and Carlton get a lesson in humility at the homeless shelter. Tiny: Rosey Brown. Steve: Zachery Ty Bryan. Candy: Jeannie Michelle. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jr. takes an IQ test, whose results are a surprise. Meanwhile, Michael isn't smart enough to assemble Kady's new jungle gym, and Kady announces what she wants to be when she grows up: a hall monitor. So she practices at school (and learns she likes bossing people around). (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Michael hurts his back playing a game on “Family Night.” The family thinks it's funny, so he decides to play with their heads. But he overplays his hand. Dr. Thomas: Jason Stuart. Dr. Klieger: Phil Reeves. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: Jay's feeling “frumpy” after she and Michael run into a gorgeous and superachieving high-school classmate named Susan (Nicole Prescott). So it's time for a makeover. Meanwhile, Jr. (George O. Gore II) has made the basketball team. That's the good news. But there's an initiation to undergo: he must sneak into the girls' locker room and retrieve a certain item of clothing. Wanda: Kim Whitley. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: My Wife and Kids
programme.desc: The Kyles go bowling and run into their not-so-charming dinner companions, the Tylers (Larry Miller, Kelly Coffield Park), at the alley. So it's a family-against-family match. But Jr. isn't interested in making war with the Tylers' daugher, Lisa (Marina Malota), and he even knows how to speak her language (it's Klingonese). Jason: Andy Morrow. Phillip: Darrel Heath. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Lily jeopardizes her relationship with JR. Cobra confronts Ryan about a rumor on the internet. Van has a questionable plan to win Jenn back. Danielle throws a fashion show to help promote her new fashion blog. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Ryan triumphantly returns to the shop after a major health scare; JR learns disturbing information about his relationship with Lily; Phor questions his career as a tattoo artist; and Lily takes down Cobra after she meddles in her relationship. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Kat questions her life in L.A.; Lily tries to turn the shop against Cobra; Charmaine's relationship is on rocky ground when her career takes priority over Neek; Nikki's jealousy rears its ugly head again; and Don blows up. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Ryan is devastated when an injury prevents him from tatting his childhood idols; Charmaine tries to persuade Cobra to stay at 9Mag; Jenn's inadvertent nip slip sends Van over the edge; and there's a photo shoot for a major tattoo magazine. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Part 1 of 2. The crew heads to Mexico for fun, sun and tequila; tensions rise when Kat arrives at the villa unannounced; Ryan loses his cool when Lily crosses a line; Kat reveals a shocking secret; and Nikki flies off the handle. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Conclusion. Cobra is faced with a tough decision when Phor tells her the truth about Velvet; Lily attempts to reunite with the sisters she hasn't seen since her father's murder; Kat decides it's time Rachel knows the truth. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Black Ink Crew: Chicago
programme.desc: Ryan tries to salvage his relationship with Rachel, while Phor and Nikki take theirs to new heights. The crew throws Kat a surprise birthday party at 9Mag behind Ryan's back. JR goes ham when Lily brings the guy she cheated on him with to the shop. (repeat)(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura

Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości(n)

programme.title: Impreska
programme.desc: Zestawienie tanecznych hitów, które idealnie sprawdzają się na imprezach. W czasie programu widzowie mogą wysyłać wiadomości SMS(n)

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura(n)

programme.title: Zranione uczucia
programme.desc: Mała Rita (Mel Maia) w dramatycznych okolicznościach traci ojca. Bezwzględna macocha (Adriana Esteves) i jej przyjaciel porzucają ją na wysypisku śmieci, gdzie musi walczyć o przetrwanie. Tam nawiązuje liczne przyjaźnie i odnajduje miłość swojego życia. Wkrótce zostaje adoptowana przez małżeństwo z Argentyny. Po wielu latach już dorosła Rita (Débora Falabella), pod imieniem Nina, wraca w rodzinne strony, by zemścić się za krzywdy z przeszłości(n)

programme.title: Prognoza pogody
programme.desc: "Prognoza pogody" jest nadawanym cyklicznie przez stację Nowa TV programem, w którym widzowie mogą zapoznać się z zapowiedziami meteorologów dotyczącymi nadchodzących dni. W każdym wydaniu prowadzący informują, jakiej temperatury należy się spodziewać w najbliższym czasie, jakie może być zachmurzenie i czy spodziewane są opady. BR"Prognoza pogody" emitowana jest w stacji Nowa TV codziennie zaraz po zakończeniu programu informacyjnego "24 godziny". Kolejne wydania prowadzi na zmianę trójka prezenterów: Aleksandra Kot, Paulina Koziejowska i Jarosław Kret. Prognozę dla Nowej TV przygotowuje Biuro Prognoz Aura(n)

programme.title: Rated A for Awesome
programme.sub-title: Against All Awesome/Planet of the Gills.
programme.desc: Double bill. The town's 200th birthday party turns into a disaster when Les learns a hard lesson about flattery - and the team's newest member quickly becomes their worst enemy. Then, when the team awesomises Noam's new pet fish, he discovers having a piscine companion is much cooler than he thought - especially when Glickersville is hit by a full-on finned revolution, thanks to Lars' inexhaustible appetite

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy and Howard are tasked to take care of a bologna `baby' for science class. However, it mysteriously comes to life. Then, Bucky creates a Ninja theme song that Ninja cannot stand

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: Double bill. Randy goes to great lengths to prove he is a good liar and puts himself in danger. Then, Randy uses the Nomicon to cheat in the Best Buds food-tasting competition

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.desc: Double bill. When a big-time Hollywood publicist discovers Spencer and vows to make him famous, Billy become insanely jealous. Then, when Billy discovers that sports stars have become even more famous than pop stars, he decides to inhabit Kleet's body and become a soccer star

programme.title: Dude, That's My Ghost
programme.sub-title: Billy, Billy, Billy, Billy, Billy/And the Winner Is.
programme.desc: Double bill. Billy creates a bunch of clones of himself, but one of the bands is a recipe for disaster. Then, Spencer has detention while the others go to an awards ceremony, and is determined to sneak out and join them

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.sub-title: How the Test Was Won/I'm OK, You're a Kat.
programme.desc: Double bill. Coop tries to study for a test but Kat keeps distracting him, and he booby-traps the whole house to make him late. Meanwhile, the boy discovers a self-help motivational tape in the House of Swap, but the feline uses it to remove his new-found positivity

programme.title: Kid vs Kat
programme.desc: Double bill. Kat scratches Coop under a full moon, and Dennis is convinced his best friend will turn into a Were-Cat. Then, home alone on Halloween, Kat communicates with the Cat Nebula, setting up a rendezvous, while Coop and Dennis try to stop a feline invasion

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.sub-title: Weinerman Tested, Cunningham Approved/Sorcerer in Love 2: Sorceress' Revenge.
programme.desc: Double bill. The boys inadvertently help create a Ninja-seeking robot. Then, the Sorceress returns to seek revenge on the Ninja

programme.title: Randy Cunningham: 9th Grade Ninja
programme.desc: During McFist Industries' 50th anniversary celebrations the Ninja reveals McFist as a villain. Now his cover's blown, McFist can focus his power on destroying the Ninja

programme.title: Boyster
programme.desc: Double bill. Boyster doesn't realise newcomer Bruno is a chef who likes oysters. Then, Boyster drapes pearls round his body to make himself look buff but they react oddly

programme.title: Phineas and Ferb

programme.title: The Worst Witch
programme.desc: The end of year exams are looming and Maud's annoyed that distracted Mildred isn't taking revision seriously. Miss Cackle goes to the cottage in the woods to learn Agatha has escaped. Ethel is desperate to find out the secret, so she does an impersonation spell to transform into Maud, hoping Mildred will open up to her. Mildred and Enid work out Ethel's plan and tell 'Maud' that the big secret is that Mildred is Miss Cackle's niece. Miss Cackle is annoyed and grounds the two of them. Mildred thinks Miss Cackle isn't herself and worries Agatha had returned from the cottage so she flies to Agatha's cottage in the woods. She meets Agatha and Gullet at the cottage and they try to take her powers, but she escapes. Ethel finds the birth scroll just as Miss Gullet and Agatha arrive at the castle. Esmerelda unwittingly invites them in, thinking Agatha is Miss Cackle, and gives up her powers - only to learn she's given them to the wrong sister. Agatha announces to the school that she is in charge. When Mildred finally arrives back at the castle, she's greeted by Maud and Miss Hardbroom who expels her
